transcript:
saw a well-built and handsome young officer entering his room. Pierre paused. He had left Moscow when Boris was a boy 01 fourteen, and had quite forgotten him, but in his usual impulsive and hearty way he took Boris by the hand with a friendly smile. 
"Do you remember me?" asked Boris quietly with a pleasant smile. "I have come with my mother to see the count, but it seems he is not well." 
"Yes, it seems he is ill. People are always dis- turbing him," answered Pierre, trying to re- member
